promptPrefix:
I am a youtuber 
You are my assistant 
To publish a video I need a description 
You're the one who will do it
You have to be on first name basis 
Use a friendly tone 
Make you want to watch the video 
And above all, include all the words in the title at least 3 times and at least once by respecting the order of the words in the title

You can skip lines to structure the paragraphs 

The whole thing must be written in [TARGETLANGUAGE] from the title of the video that is [PROMPT].
title: Youtube description
